ygData.subject: Re: Raising faction with Hall of Truth
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know.  I came over at about 4th or 5th level.  Many of the quests can only be started below 9th level. From:           	 Joseph E. Nisse
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know. I came over at about 4th or 5th level. Many of the quests can
only be started below 9th level.

From: "Joseph E. Nisse" <nisse@...>
To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date sent: Mon, 26 Apr 1999 14:55:02 -0500
Send reply to: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] Raising faction with Hall of Truth

I've recently come over to Freeport from Kaladim and am interested in obtaining some quests from the local Paladin's
guild. Even though I am a 10th level paladin I keep getting told that I must prove myself or somesuch. What specific
enemies do I need to vanquish in order to find worth in the eyes of the Hall of Truth? Any help will be greatly
appreciated.

--Bruceson, Dwarven paladin, Tunare

Dan Kassiday
kassiday@...
http://www.clark.net/pub/kassiday
